name: Netarhat
description: Hill station known for sunrise and sunset views.

name: Hundru Falls
description: One of the highest waterfalls near Ranchi on the Subarnarekha river.

name: Jonha Falls

name: Hirni Falls
description: Picturesque waterfall with surrounding forests in Khunti.

name: Betla National Park

name: Palamu Fort
description: Historic twin forts built by Chero dynasty near Betla.

name: Baidyanath Temple (Deoghar)
description: One of the twelve Jyotirlingas, a major Hindu temple.

description: Scenic waterfall on the Kanchi River near Ranchi.

name: Patratu Valley
description: Stunning valley drive with panoramic views and lake.

name: Parasnath Hill (Shikharji)
description: Important Jain pilgrimage site with hilltop temples.

name: Dalma Wildlife Sanctuary
description: Elephant corridors, trekking routes near Jamshedpur.

name: Jubilee Park, Jamshedpur

name: Ranchi
description: Capital city known for lakes, waterfalls, and culture.
